text: The Powerpuff Girls Movie is a 2002 American animated comedy-mystery action superhero adventure family movie based on the Cartoon Network animated television series The Powerpuff Girls. This movie is directed by series creator Craig McCracken and produced by Cartoon Network Studios and Warner Bros Pictures. ==Story== Townsville has been through crime. The Professor is buying ingredients to make girls for his experiment. As his lab monkey Jojo pushed him, breaking a vat of Chemical X, the girls were created. The Professor gave them their names; Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup. ==Voice Cast== *Cathy Cavadini - Blossom *Tara Strong - Bubbles *Elizabeth Daily - Buttercup *Tom Kane - Professor Utonium *Tom Kenny - Mayor Barney, Narrator, Cha-Ching, Pappy Wappy *Jennifer Hale - Ms. Keane *Jennifer Martin - Ms. Sara Bellum == Home media release == The movie was released on VHS and DVD on November 5, 2002. It is also available to stream on Cartoon Network On Demand and the Cartoon Network mobile app. == References == Category:Movies based on TV series Category:American animated movies Category:2002 action movies Category:2002 comedy movies Category:2002 animated movies Category:2000s action comedy movies Category:2000s fantasy-comedy movies Category:2000s superhero movies Category:2000s mystery movies Category:American family movies Category:The Powerpuff Girls Category:Movies about primates Category:Movies about sisters Category:Superhero comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American superhero movies Category:Movies set in the United States Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Traditionally animated movies Category:Traditional animation Category:Rough Draft Studios movies
title: The Powerpuff Girls Movie
